name: Monopoly
mission completed when: you build all of your tools first
why: you don't mind using open data but don't publish any yourself

name: Infomediary
role: to get other players using your data
mission completed when: at the end of the game all your data is used and being used in other players' tools
why: you provide essential services for society

name: Activist
mission completed when: at the end of the game all the data is open
why: because you are spreading your mission

name: Planet
role: get environmental value of world to 8
mission completed when: at the end of the game the environmental world score is on 8

name: People
role: get social value of world to 8
mission completed when: at the end of the game the social world score is on 8
why: because we need to be kind to each other

name: Profit
role: get economic value of world to 8
mission completed when: at the end of the game the economic world score is on 8
